Package io.atomix.storage.journal

Class JournalSegmentWriter<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.storage.journal.JournalSegmentWriter<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JournalWriter<E>, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class JournalSegmentWriter<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements JournalWriter<E>
    Segment writer.

    The format of an entry in the log is as follows:

    • 64-bit index
    • 8-bit boolean indicating whether a term change is contained in the entry
    • 64-bit optional term
    • 32-bit signed entry length, including the entry type ID
    • 8-bit signed entry type ID
    • n-bit entry bytes
